alert.note: Alert for Indian River (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued November 16 at 9:00PM EST by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of east central Florida, including the following county, Indian River. * WHEN...Until 1030 PM EST. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 859 PM EST, Doppler radar indicated slow moving thunderstorms with very heavy rainfall across the warned area. Up to 9 inches of rain have fallen, with the highest totals near Vero Lake Estates. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 2 inches are possible in the warned area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Sebastian, Fellsmere, Sebastian Highlands, Wabasso, Roseland, Winter Beach and Vero Lake Estates. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
